mapper.sql: id, medical_num, medical_name_china, medical_name_pinyin, medical_name_english, medical_use_number, medical_measure, medical_use, medical_detail, medical_stand, unit1, unit2, medical_precautions, medical_dosage_usage, medical_class_one_id, medical_class_two_id, medical_class_three_id, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from sicmed_medical where del_flag = 0 AND (medical_name_china LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR medical_name_english LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')) limit #{beginNo},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into sicmed_medical (id, medical_num, medical_name_china, medical_name_pinyin, medical_name_english, medical_use_number, medical_measure, medical_use, medical_detail, medical_stand, unit1, unit2, medical_precautions, medical_dosage_usage, medical_class_one_id, medical_class_two_id, medical_class_three_id, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalNameChina,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalNamePinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalNameEnglish,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalUseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalMeasure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalStand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalPrecautions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalDosageUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalClassOneId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalClassTwoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalClassThreeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})
